\documentclass[10pt,twoside,english]{scrartcl}

\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage[letterpaper]{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=2cm,bmargin=2cm,lmargin=2cm,rmargin=2cm,footskip=1cm}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\setlength{\parindent}{0cm}
\usepackage{babel}
\usepackage[unicode=true,
 bookmarks=true,bookmarksnumbered=false,bookmarksopen=false,
 breaklinks=false,pdfborder={0 0 0},backref=false,colorlinks=true]
 {hyperref}
\hypersetup{pdftitle={\VAR{ report_number }},
 pdfauthor={Louis-Philippe Lemieux Perreault},
 linkcolor={link_blue},citecolor={link_blue},urlcolor={link_blue}}

\makeatletter
\usepackage[activate={true,nocompatibility},final,tracking=true,kerning=true,spacing=true,factor=1100,stretch=10,shrink=10]{microtype}

% Some color definitions
\usepackage{xcolor}
\definecolor{blue}{HTML}{0099CC}
\definecolor{red}{HTML}{CC0000}
\definecolor{green}{HTML}{669900}
\definecolor{link_blue}{HTML}{21759B}
\definecolor{light_gray}{HTML}{BABABA}

% Floats, caption and subcaptions
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage[bf]{caption}

% Ordinal numbers
\usepackage{engord}

% To use the path command
\usepackage{url}

% The Report number...
\newcommand{\ReportNumber}{\VAR{ report_number }}

% Fancy header
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\fancyfoot[RO,LE]{\footnotesize{\thepage}}
\fancyfoot[LO,RE]{\footnotesize{\ReportNumber}}
\fancyfoot[C]{\footnotesize{Automatically generated by \texttt{\VAR{ package_name }} version \VAR{ package_version }}}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{1pt}

% The plain fancy header
\fancypagestyle{plain}{
    \fancyhf{} % clear all header and footer fields
    \fancyfoot[RO,LE]{\footnotesize{\thepage}}
    \fancyfoot[LO,RE]{\footnotesize{\ReportNumber}}
    \fancyfoot[C]{\footnotesize{Automatically generated by \texttt{\VAR{ package_name }} version \VAR{ package_version }}}
    \renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
    \renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{1pt}
}

% Table's numerotations are in Roman numbers
\renewcommand{\thetable}{\Roman{table}}

\let\tempone\itemize
\let\temptwo\enditemize
\renewenvironment{itemize}{\tempone\setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}}{\temptwo}

\let\ttempone\enumerate
\let\ttemptwo\endenumerate
\renewenvironment{enumerate}{\ttempone\setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}}{\ttemptwo}

\let\tttempone\description
\let\tttemptwo\enddescription
\renewenvironment{description}{\tttempone\setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}}{\tttemptwo}

\makeatother

\begin{document}

\title{\VAR{ title }}


\subtitle{\ReportNumber}


\author{\VAR{ author }}


\date{\VAR{ month } \engordnumber{\VAR{ day }}, \VAR{ year }}

\maketitle
\microtypesetup{protrusion=false} % disables protrusion locally in the document

\tableofcontents{}

\microtypesetup{protrusion=true} % enables protrusion


\VAR{ report_content }


\bibliographystyle{references}
\phantomsection\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{\refname}%
\bibliography{references}

\clearpage

\phantomsection\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{Annex I: Execution time}%
\section*{Annex I: Execution times}\label{sec:execution_time}

\VAR{ annex_content }

\end{document}
